page.title: 12Customs
page.content:
Playground Games
Here are some of the games we play at Camblesforth C.P. School. Lines In this game we use the lines painted on the playground for Netball. The game is played like 'Tig', someone is "on". They stand in the centre and count to ten and then try to catch all the players. You are only allowed to run along the lines. Boo This game is played round a wall on the playground. The person who is "on" shuts their eyes and counts to a hundred. The players keep out of sight behind the wall and try to remain unseen throughout the game. If the person who is "on" sees them she shouts "Boo" and the person seen becomes the new "on".
